r1.name: Unbreakable Will
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}}. For the next 7 seconds, '''Alistar''' {{tip|Damage reduction|reduces}} incoming damage received.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Alistar cleanses himself of all crowd control. For the next 7 seconds, Alistar reduces incoming damage received.
r1.notes:
* {{tip|True damage}} cannot be reduced by any means and will deal full damage to '''Alistar''' during ''Unbreakable Will''.
* ''Unbreakable Will's'' modifier to incoming damage stacks additively with {{cai|Hemoplague|Vladimir}} for a total reduction of 45/55/65%.{{tt|*|this might be unintended}}
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|120|100|80}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/120/100/80/0' and riot's value '120,100,80' as '120/100/80'

i1.name: Triumphant Roar
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Alistar''' gains a [[stack]] of ''Triumph'' for every enemy {{tip|champion}} he {{tip|stun|stuns}} or {{tip|airborne|displaces}} with {{ai|Pulverize|Alistar}}, {{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}}, or {{ai|Trample|Alistar}}, and every time an enemy {{tip|minion}} or non-epic {{tip|monster}} dies nearby.
At 7 ''Triumph'' stacks, '''Alistar''' consumes them and roars, {{tip|healing}} himself for {{pp|25 to 161}} and all nearby allied champions for{{ft|double the amount.|{{pp|25*2 to 161*2}}.}}
'''Alistar''' roars instantly if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies. Once ''Triumph'' stacks are consumed '''Alistar''' cannot roar again for a short duration, but can still gain stacks.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Alistar gains a stack of Triumph for every enemy champion he stuns or displaces with Pulverize, Headbutt, or Trample, and every time an enemy minion or non-epic monster dies nearby.
At 7 Triumph stacks, Alistar consumes them and roars, healing himself for 25undefined − 161undefined (based on level) and all nearby allied champions for
Alistar roars instantly if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies. Once Triumph stacks are consumed Alistar cannot roar again for a short duration, but can still gain stacks.
i1.notes:
* '''Alistar''' does not gain stacks for unsuccessfully trying to apply {{tip|crowd control}}, for instance against a {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} target.
** '''Alistar''' will still gain a stack for unsuccessfully trying to knock back a {{tip|spell shield|spellshielded}} champion with {{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}}.{{bug}}
* Healing occurs simultaneously for '''Alistar''' and his allies.
** There is a VFX projectile (700 missile speed) that cannot be destroyed by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and is unrelated to the actual heal.
* '''Alistar''' loses all ''Triumph'' stacks upon dying.

q1.name: Pulverize
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' slams the ground beneath him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|stun|stunning}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} simultaneously for 1 second.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Alistar slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning and knocking them up simultaneously for 1 second.
q1.notes:
* ''Pulverize'' can be buffered during {{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}} to cast with reduced cast time when the dash ends.
* ''Pulverize'' will cast from wherever '''Alistar''' is at the end of the cast time.

e1.name: Trample
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and tramples the ground around him every {{fd|0.5}} seconds for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and gaining a ''Trample'' [[stack]] every time the ability damages at least one enemy champion, up to 5.

At 5 ''Trample'' stacks, '''Alistar's''' {{tip|basic attack}} {{tip|on-hit}} against a {{tip|champion}} within 6 seconds consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|20 to 275}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} and apply a 1-second {{tip|stun}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Alistar becomes ghosted and tramples the ground around him every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and gaining a Trample stack every time the ability damages at least one enemy champion, up to 5.
At 5 Trample stacks, Alistar's basic attack on-hit against a champion within 6 seconds consumes all stacks to deal 20undefined − 275undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage and apply a 1-second stun.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|8 to 20}} {{as|(+ 4% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 200}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* ''Trample'' deals {{tip|persistent area damage}} damage around '''Alistar''', while the bonus damage on the resulting attack is {{tip|proc damage}}.
* The {{tip|stun}} and '''bonus''' damage are blocked by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} but the base attack damage is not.
* The on-hit effect is consumed if the attack {{tip|blocked}}, but not if it is {{tip|dodged}} or missed while '''Alistar''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. In all cases, the attack's effects are negated as normal.
* As it is an [[on-hit]] effect, the bonus damage and stun can be applied by {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} Phantom Hit.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|12 to 10}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/11.333/10.667/10/9.333/0' and riot's value '12,11.5,11,10.5,10' as '12/11.5/11/10.5/10'

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 4% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

w1.name: Headbutt
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 400 units upon arrival, he deals them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}} {{tt|700 units|200 units when combined with Pulverize}} over {{fd|0.5 seconds}} while also {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Alistar dashes to the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 400 units upon arrival, he deals them magic damage and knocks them back 700 units over 0.5 seconds while also stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
w1.notes:
* The dash speed depends on the inverse of the distance to the target:
** If '''Alistar's''' [[size|radius]] overlaps with his target's, he will dash with {{as|1200 speed|movement speed}}.
** If '''Alistar''' is further from his target than the previous condition, he will dash with (1200 {{times}} dash distance) / (dash distance - sum of radiuses).
*** At maximum target range, against an enemy with a 65 {{tip|gameplay radius}} (median of all champions), '''Alistar''' will dash with {{as|1544 speed|movement speed}} (reaching his target within {{tt|{{fd|0.429}} seconds|rounded to next game tick}}).
*** Both the lower the dash distance and the larger '''Alistar''' and/or his target, the faster the dash becomes; this scales hyperbolically.
* When {{ai|Pulverize|Alistar}} is buffered during the dash, the knockback distance is reduced to 200 units.
* The CC duration of the ability can be reduced by up-to 25% {{stil|Tenacity}}, due to airborne not being reducible while the stun is.
* The {{tip|airborne|knockback}} direction is in a straight line from '''Alistar's''' original location at start of cast and the enemy when '''Alistar's''' dash ends.
* ''Headbutt'' can knock enemies through terrain. The {{tip|airborne|knockback}} stops short on walls that cannot be surpassed but the disable duration is not changed.
* The [[spell indicator]] for this ability also displays the direction for the knock back relative to '''Alistar's''' position.
* '''Alistar's''' {{stil|attack range}} is reduced{{ft|to -375|by 500}}during ''Headbutt'', to prevent him from being able to attack the target when he completes the dash.
